author: francek
title: Web 3.0 user profile (web avatar)
description: Web users should be allowed to create, edit and control their own user profile. Why create the same user profile on different websites?
solution: Describe your own DID. Provide as much data & media as you are willing. Control what data will you offer to which websites.
experience: I have 7 years of professional experience in full-stack web development. I had developed & scientifically researched semantic web projects.
